feed.title: Romain Hermary
feed.subtitle: I am Romain HERMARY, a 5th year research student at EPITA, a engineering school for computer science. This is my website where I upload various things related to my work.

entry.title: JMIV - Paper Submission
entry.summary: Deep Learning, Morphological Layer, CNN, Grayscale Morphology, Research Paper, JMIV Learning Grayscale Mathematical Morphology with SmoothMorphological Layers After 6 months of working on the integration of mathematical morphology in a neural network, I was able with the help of my supervisors to make a submission to the Journal of Mathematical Imaging and Vision (JMIV). entry.title: Detection of Venation Intersections in Bee Wings

link.title: Detection of Venation Intersections in Bee Wings

entry.summary: Image processing, Image Detection Project The goal of this project was to find an algorithms pipeline that would get the venation intersection detected. Microscopic images and some ground truth were given, but purposely not enough not for deep learning to be used.
